title: Hey Riot you forgot to remove "Stealth Wards Purchased" for the match history on the browser
body:
Just letting you guys know since its kinda useless now that they are gone. You guys fixed it on the clients stats but not the one on the browser.

http://imgur.com/a/wjl85 example

replies.body: Yeeeeaaaaa that's kind of a misleading stat nowadays isn't it? I'll pass that info along to the best people, but for the time being feel free to ignore that statistic ^_^!
